parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category under which the recipe will be listed in the crafting menu.

parameters.name: NeedToBeLearn
parameters.description: Whether the recipe needs to be learned before it can be crafted.

parameters.name: SkillRequired
parameters.description: The skill required to craft the item.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to define the special behavior of the recipe.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time it takes to craft the item, not using a specific unit of time.

parameters.name: timedAction
parameters.description: The timed action script to trigger during crafting. Used to trigger animations and/or sounds.

parameters.name: xpAward
parameters.description: The amount of experience points awarded upon crafting the item.
